txt.en: Bats are quite the nuisance in this grove. Their numbers could stand to be thinned a bit.
You have helped to thin the dense population of bats in this part of the forest.
Bats are quite the nuisance in this grove.
Defeated bats near the abandoned camp-site ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat bats near the abandoned camp-site ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bats can be found around the abandoned encampment.\n\nYou should defeat bats, for they do little but harass and annoy, and pose a threat to passers-by.
You have defeated several harassing, annoying bats in the centre of Fangorn's eaves.
